description: Ibiribwa bibisi n’ibiryo byasigaye bishobora gutera indwara iyo bitabitswe neza.
title: Ibiribwa bibisi n’ibiryo byasigaye bishobora gutera indwara iyo bitabitswe neza.
content:
Ibiribwa bibisi n’ibiryo byasigaye bishobora gutera indwara iyo bitabitswe neza. 
Ibiribwa bibisi nk’imboga n’imbuto bigomba kurongwa mbere yo kuribwa cyangwa 
gutekwa. Ibiryo byasigaye bigomba gushyushywa mbere y’uko byongera kuribwa.
